lead_paragraph: The proposal would be paired with tax breaks for companies that use new tank cars built to better withstand derailments.

headline.print_headline: Senators Propose Fees for Shipping Oil by Rail Car
headline.main: Senators Propose Fees for Shipping Oil by Rail Car

snippet: The proposal would be paired with tax breaks for companies that use new tank cars built to better withstand derailments.
abstract: Senators from six states, seeking to increase railroad safety, propose that government charge companies special fee to ship oil, ethanol and other hazardous liquids in older tank cars; proposal would also include recommendation for companies using new, safer tank cars receive tax credit.
